attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit on our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reduce the speed limits on all our roads, as there are Far to many cars on our roads today and in the future there will be far to manay cars on the roads, such as 60mph to 50mph and 70mph to 60mph for motorways.
The speed limit does not mean you have to travel that speed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
